title: A new skin for teemo
body: I came across on the internet on a cool fanart namely where {{champion:17}}  had a mititiar skin on. In the link you come to the fanart. I would be happy and all other {{champion:17}}  determined even if the riot skin would implement and offer in the shop.write in the comments how you like the skin and how much it should cost.

replies.body: I would really think this Skin would be awesome, but it shall only be limited avaible or an other Skin be delated {{summoner:14}}  cause i think he has a lot of Skins, but i like this skin{{champion:17}} better than the others{{summoner:6}} {{item:3115}}
i find the skin Werry cool

i think the skin is cool and i want to see it ingame , i would prefer it should cost like 975-1350 rp :)

i hope it will be inplemented in the game bye 
-Lukas
